title: Honor Resets..
body: So I ended the season as honor lvl 5 but then something unfortunate happened, I said a toxic word then got reported by a 5 man and got a 14-day suspension. Does my honor not reset with the new season even tho I got banned in pre-season?

replies.body: Honor ranks 2+ were reset back to a certain checkpoint depending on which rank they were. Accounts which were dishonorable and placed at rank 1/0 haven't had those negative honor ranks reset just like regular punishments aren't reset at a new season. You still need to show consistent reform by not repeating the same type of behavior or language that warranted the report or punishment.
